content.prompt: The excerpt most likely reflects which of the following historical situations?

choices.label: Abraham Lincoln won all of the electoral college votes in the presidential election.
Formerly enslaved people were given the right to vote in presidential elections.
Southern states refused to participate in the presidential election.
States in the South had begun seceding after the presidential election.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
